import { useState } from "react"; import Button from "../buttons/Button"; import arrow from "../images/icon-arrow.svg"; export default function FAQ() { const [expandedItemId, setExpandedItemId] = useState(null); function handleOnClick(itemId) { expandedItemId === itemId ? setExpandedItemId(null) : setExpandedItemId(itemId); } // if the item is already expanded, it will close it return (
